grendel.widgets
Class Spring

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--grendel.widgets.Spring
public class Spring
extends java.awt.Container

Spring provides a lightweight component which participates in layout but has no view. A Spring automatically sets its size to fill the space between it and the other Components in a Container, pushing the other components to either side, as needed.

See Also:
Container, Serialized Form
